mapper.select: select a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ,a.disp_order ,a.start_yearmonth ,a.end_yearmonth ,a.business_content ,a.biko from bt003_career a where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} and a.certification_no = cast(#{certification_no} as integer)

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,b.certification_no ,b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth ,b.end_yearmonth ,b.business_content ,b.biko ,b.update_date ,c.technology_Lang --技術区分（開発言語） ,c.technology_OS --技術区分（OS） ,c.technology_DB --技術区分（DB） ,d.process_name --工程名 ,d.process_name_short --工程名略 from am005_employee a inner join bt003_career b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join ( select a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ,string_agg( case b.technology_kbn when '01' then b.technology_name --技術区分（開発言語） else null end,',' order by b.disp_order,b.technology_name) as technology_Lang ,string_agg( case b.technology_kbn when '02' then b.technology_name --技術区分（OS） else null end,',' order by b.disp_order,b.technology_name) as technology_OS ,string_agg( case b.technology_kbn when '03' then b.technology_name --技術区分（DB） else null end,',' order by b.disp_order,b.technology_name) as technology_DB from bt004_careertechnology a left join bm002_technology b on a.technology_id = b.technology_id where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} group by a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ) c on b.employee_id = c.employee_id and b.certification_no = c.certification_no left join ( select a.employee_id ,a.certification_no --工程 ,string_agg(b.process_name ,',' order by b.disp_order,b.process_name) as process_name ,string_agg(b.process_name_short ,',' order by b.disp_order,b.process_name_short) as process_name_short from bt006_careerprocess a left join bm004_process b on a.process_id = b.process_id where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} group by a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ) d on b.employee_id = d.employee_id and b.certification_no = d.certification_no where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} and COALESCE(b.business_content ,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{business_content} , '%') and COALESCE(b.biko,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{biko} , '%') order by b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth ,b.end_yearmonth

select a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ,a.disp_order ,a.start_yearmonth ,a.end_yearmonth ,a.business_content ,a.biko from bt003_career a where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} order by a.certification_no
